content: **big basket** it s big we love big home decrease baskets big medium small any size baskets handmade baskets are all so beautiful and functional the pattern is written for the pictured basket size approximately 13 we added gorgeous leather handles to make it complete crochet different sizes with simple modifications to the bottom my cats were also very interested in the basket project but they couldn t have this one i ll just have to make one for each of them enjoy **materials** one skein of bobbiny jumbo 9mm braiding cord 100% recycled cotton & polyester core 100 meters size q 15 75mm crochet hook smaller size crochet hook for tucking in the ends 8mm h one locking stitch marker yarn needle the bottom of the basket is 13 in diameter 6 tall gauge is 1 st /inch
